org.apache.distributedlog

Class BookKeeperClientBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.distributedlog.BookKeeperClientBuilder

  • public class BookKeeperClientBuilder
extends Object
    Builder to build bookkeeper client.

    • Method Summary

      Set the ledgers path that bookkeeper client is going to access.

      Set client name.

      Create a bookkeeper client builder to build bookkeeper clients.

      • zkc

        public BookKeeperClientBuilder zkc(ZooKeeperClient zkc)
        Set the zkc used to build bookkeeper client. If a zookeeper client is provided in this method, bookkeeper client will use it rather than creating a brand new one.
        Parameters:
        zkc - zookeeper client.
        Returns:
        builder
        See Also:
        zkServers(String)

      • zkServers

        public BookKeeperClientBuilder zkServers(String zkServers)
        Set the zookeeper servers that bookkeeper client would connect to. If no zookeeper client is provided by zkc(ZooKeeperClient), bookkeeper client will use the given string to create a brand new zookeeper client.
        Parameters:
        zkServers - zookeeper servers that bookkeeper client would connect to.
        Returns:
        builder
        See Also:
        zkc(ZooKeeperClient)

      • ledgersPath

        public BookKeeperClientBuilder ledgersPath(String ledgersPath)
        Set the ledgers path that bookkeeper client is going to access.
        Parameters:
        ledgersPath - ledgers path
        Returns:
        builder
        See Also:
        AbstractConfiguration.getZkLedgersRootPath()
